A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson has added a new and indescribable element to the Star Wars franchise. From different visual techniques that Star Wars has never seen to plot points that will question everything that you know\, TLJ is everything that cinema was created for. It blew my mind\, it gave me the chills\, and dammit it made me cry. In the beginning\, I\, a cinema-nerd\, questioned the visual and technical correlation to the previous films\, but be not afraid Rian Johnson prevails in one of the most visually-stunning and chilling finales that film has ever seen. Rejoice Star Wars geeks\, the future is in good hands.
